---
title: "TNC Map"
editor: visual
format: dashboard
---

## Row {height="33%"}
### Column {width="100%"}
```{r, echo=FALSE}

library(leaflet)

TNC<-read.csv("data/CalGRO_well_locations_extended.csv")

Calgro_map <- leaflet(TNC) %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addProviderTiles("Esri.WorldImagery") %>%
  setView(lng = -118.63, lat = 37.6, zoom = 6) %>%
  addCircleMarkers(
    ~Longitude, ~Latitude,
    radius = 1.5,) 
Calgro_map
```
